thread.title: Kimberly
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Kimberly

author: Kimberly
title: Kimberly
text:
Service was great however the merchandise was see through and I can't wear it. It is a Close Out.
Shipping was a bit steep. I didn't even order a fast delivery and it cost me $13.00. I send items to Minneapolis all the time and don't spend that much on shipping.
